headline: HBOs John Oliver: Disney Should Pay More Taxes but Not Because of Dipsh*t DeSantis
author: David Ng
sentences: Oliver called DeSantis a right-wing dipshit? and falsely accused the governor of being scared? of gay people, presumably because of Floridas Parental Rights in Education law, which prohibits the teaching of sexuality and gender ideology to children in kindergarten through third grade.

Oliver also repeated establishment media claims that Florida taxpayers could end up footing Disneys $1 billion in outstanding bond debt.
I dont love that it might happen not through meaningful tax reform but on the whim of one right-wing dipshit whos scared of gay people and doesnt understand the First Amendment.
